content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Magdeburg to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Regarding the rental price, I'm open to discussing the best offer that suits both our needs. How much were you considering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the average market price of similar apartments in the city center, I propose 500 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that price. It is far below the value of my apartment. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the high quality of the apartment and its prime location. Would you be willing to reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that your apartment is of high quality and has a prime location. However, I'm a student and I'm offering the price that I can afford. I can pay 550 euros per month. This is the highest amount that I can pay without exceeding my budget. I'm hoping that we can find a solution that is satisfactory for both of us.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but 550 euros is still not enough for me to consider renting out my apartment. It's a significant discount from what I'm expecting. Could you perhaps increase your offer a bit more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your concern. As a student, I have a limited budget, but I'm willing to pay a little more to get a high-quality apartment like yours. I can offer 600 euros per month. This is the highest amount I can pay, and I hope you can consider this offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 600 euros is closer to what I'm looking for, but it's still not quite there. I understand that you're a student and have financial constraints, but my apartment is newly built and in a prime location. It's worth more than what you're offering. Can you possibly increase your offer further?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. As a student, my budget is limited. However, I'm willing to pay a little more to get a high-quality apartment like yours. I can offer 625 euros per month. This is the highest amount I can pay, and I hope you can consider this offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 625 euros is more in line with what I'm expecting for my apartment. It's still not the highest price I could potentially get, but it's a fair offer considering your situation as a student. I'm willing to accept this price. Thank you for your willingness to negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [625] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Wonderful! Thank you, Yi-Nuo. I'm glad we were able to reach an agreement. The apartment will be a great place for you to live, and I hope you enjoy your time in Magdeburg. Is there anything else we need to discuss before we finalize the lease?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Herr Schmidt. I'm looking forward to renting your apartment. We don't need to discuss anything else. I'm ready to sign the lease once we agree on the move-in date.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Excellent! Let's set the move-in date for the first of next month. I'll have the lease agreement ready for you to sign at that time. Is there anything else you need from me before then?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, Herr Schmidt. Everything seems to be in order. Thank you for your help and cooperation. I'm looking forward to moving into the apartment on the first of next month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Yi-Nuo. I'm looking forward to having you as a tenant. If you have any questions or need assistance with anything before the move-in date, please let me know. Enjoy the rest of your day!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Herr Schmidt. You too. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
